name: Magrix
description:
You are Jonny, humankinds' last hope. When evil robots invaded Earth, scientists sought a method to overcome them. After many failed attempts, they finally invented the ultimate weapon: Magnetron 2000.

As a former commando, you have been chosen to enter their base and trigger the base's self-destruct procedure. But that's not easy: The button that activates it is protected by two plasma walls and a rocket launching enemies. But luckily you will have the Magnetron 2000.

Can you accomplish the task?
